cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## CMS_Tag.TagID, TagName, COUNT(DocumentID) AS TagCount FROM CMS_DocumentTag JOIN CMS_Tag ON CMS_DocumentTag.TagID = CMS_Tag.TagID JOIN CMS_TagGroup ON CMS_Tag.TagGroupID = CMS_TagGroup.TagGroupID WHERE (DocumentID IN (SELECT DocumentID FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined WHERE ##WHERE##)) GROUP BY CMS_Tag.TagID, TagName ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
